notes.title: **Event**
points: - - 3 points will now be earned for defeating every level 15+ Cog
- - Added a 30% chance to earn a Didgeridollar from completing a quest part.

notes.title: **Features**
points: - Added the previously unused Snowland Tag Game Arena to The Brrrgh's Tag Game!
- Added your Didgeridollar count to the Inventory GUI

notes.title: **Bugfixes**
points: - The Captain's returned from his fishing trip!
- - No longer are you forced to enjoy the day in Barnacle Boatyard with him.

notes.title: **Misc**
points: - Managed to get Lil' Oldman to unlock his door.
- Added a new batch of words to the chat whitelist.
- Added a check to send missing Quest Rewards upon login.
